pli-tv-bu-vb-sk25:1.3.1: As in _sekhiya_ 15, [Bu Sk 15:1.3](pli-tv-bu-vb-sk15:1.3), it seems that _gacchati_, which normally means “to go”, here refers to any posture more upright than outright sitting down. Moreover, it seems to refer to any sort of movement from one place to another, however minor.
